title.rendered: SMEs Must Invest to Upgrade Their Digital Platform for Next Level

content.rendered:
SMEs Must Invest to Upgrade Their Digital Platform for Next Level

 

The prominent SME focussed business magazine- SME World – has featured Digiperform in the corporate story highlighting its business model, expansion plans, clientele and traction Digital Marketing is receiving in India, in its May issue by the Editor – Rajen Kumar.

The publication carried out the cover story in an open discussion with Manu Jolly, Co-Founder of Digiperform under the headline – “Digiperform Striving to Create Industry Ready Digital Marketing Professionals: SMEs Must Invest to Upgrade Their Digital Platform for Next Level”, in its print and online edition.

Coverage Details:  

Publication – SME World Magazine

Headline – Digiperform Striving to Create Industry Ready Digital Marketing Professionals:  SMEs Must Invest to Upgrade Their Digital Platform for Next Level

Issue– May 2018

Page– 12-13

Edition– Print and Online

Link– http://smeworld.asia/Interviews.aspx?Interviews=Interv-217/digiperform-striving-to-create-industry-ready-digital-marketing-professionals—smes-must-invest-to-upgrade-their–digital-platform-for-next-level#.WxDmfTSFPIU

excerpt.rendered: The prominent SME focussed business magazine- SME World – has featured Digiperform in the corporate story highlighting its business model, expansion plans, clientele and traction Digital Marketing is receiving in India, in its May issue by the Editor – Rajen Kumar.
